channel.title: 718 Matrix Background
channel.description: On the loading for Lost-Realm/Matrix source, it comes up with the matrix background. I tried to change the background using a sprite editor, and it just gives me a black screen when i try to load my client. Any help on how to sort this situation would be much appreciated!!!
